description: The DeLaurier Homestead and trail is a two-storey, gable-roofed building with two attached log houses.
The homestead illustrates the life of a French-Canadian pioneer family in the mid-19th Century. Walk the trail to observe nature's reclamation of an 1850s-era apple orchard.
Photo by The Cosmonaut via Wikipedia Commons. Licensed under CC BY-SA 2.5.
Interior & boardwalk photos by Ken Lund via Flickr, licensed under CC BY-SA 2.0.
